#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,x,maxi,mini,d,teamno,bal,i,j;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=10;j++)
        {
           cin>>x;
           mini=maxi=x;
           for(i=1;i<15;i++)
           {
              cin>>x;
              if(x<mini)
                 mini=x;
              else if(x>maxi)
                 maxi=x;
           }
           d=maxi-mini;
           if(j==1)
           {
               bal=d;
               teamno=j;
           }
           else if(d<=bal)
           {
               bal=d;
               teamno=j;
           }
        }
        cout<<teamno<<" "<<bal<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
